resources.string: Do you want to exit the application?
Split and organize your PDFs! Ideal for tax returns.

1. Click on "Select PDF" to choose one or more files from your computer.
2. The name of the selected file will appear below the button.
3. Click the "Process PDF" button.
4. Wait while the system splits the PDF into individual pages and tries to identify the provider's name on each one.
5. The processed pages will appear in the "Processed Pages" section below, with download buttons. Each file will be named with the provider's name (if found).
No valid PDF file selected. Only PDF files are allowed.
Some files were not PDFs and were ignored.
Ready to process. Select PDF files.
Merge PDFs into a Single File

1. Click on "Choose PDF Files" to select the PDF files you want to merge.
2. The order of the selected files will be the order in which they will be merged in the final PDF.
3. Click the "Merge PDFs" button.
4. A download link for the merged PDF will be generated after processing.
Ready to process. Select PDF files.
Ready to process. Click Merge PDFs.
Error processing file %1$s. Please check the file.
Done! Click the button to download the merged PDF.
An error occurred while merging the PDFs. See the console for more details.

1. Click on "Select PDF" to choose a file from your computer.
2. The name of the selected file will appear below the button.
3. Click the "Process PDF" button.
4. Wait while the system processes your file and splits it into 1 file for each page of the original file.
5. The processed pages will appear in the "Processed Pages" section below, with download links.
An error occurred while processing the PDF.
Error loading the PDF library. Please reload the page.

1. Click on "Choose Files" to select the images (JPG, JPEG, PNG).
2. Thumbnails of the selected images will be displayed below.
3. Click the "Generate PDF" button.
4. A download link for the PDF will be generated after processing.
Ready to process. Select one or more images.
Ready to process. Click Generate PDF.
Error processing image %1$s. Please check the file.
Done! Click the button to download the PDF.
An error occurred while generating the PDF. See the console for more details.
No valid images selected. Only image files are allowed.
Some files were not images and were ignored.
Extract all pages from a PDF as JPG images!

1. Click "Choose PDF File" to select the desired document.
2. Click the "Convert to JPG" button.
3. The process may take a few moments, depending on the size of the PDF.
4. Thumbnails and download links for each page will appear below.
Ready to process. Select a PDF file.
Ready to convert. Click the \"Convert to JPG\" button.
Conversion complete! Download your images below.
Invalid file type. Please select a PDF file.
Please select a valid PDF file.
An error occurred while converting the PDF.
Your privacy is important to us. It is PDFspliter\'s policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you in our application.

Our application, PDFspliter, is designed to work offline. It does not collect, store, or transmit any personally identifiable information about you. All PDF files and images you process with the application remain on your device.
The application may request the following permissions:
Storage Access (Read and Write): This permission is necessary for the application to read the files (PDFs, JPGs) you select and to save the processed files to your device.
We do not use any third-party analytics tools to collect data about how you use the application. No information about your activities in the application is sent to us or to third parties.
We do not employ third-party companies and individuals in our application.
Since we do not collect your data, there is no risk of data exposure from our side. The security of your files on your device depends on the general security measures of your Android device.
Our application does not contain links to other sites.
Our services are not intended for anyone under the age of 13. As we do not collect personal information, we do not knowingly collect information from children under 13.

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
This policy is effective as of 25/12/2025.
If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at marcos.nunes.lph@outlook.com.
